original_text: God took Jesus back up to heaven. He caused Jesus to sit at his right side, the place of great honour. Jesus received the Holy Spirit from his Father God, so that he could give the Spirit to us. This is what God had promised to do. God has poured his Holy Spirit on us. Now you are seeing and hearing the result of this.
korean_text: 하나님이 오른손으로 예수를 높이시매 그가 약속하신 성령을 아버지께 받아서 너희가 보고 듣는 이것을 부어 주셨느니라

sentences.original_text: God took Jesus back up to heaven.
He caused Jesus to sit at his right side,
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 예수님을 자신의 오른편에 앉게 하셨다.

sentences.original_text: Jesus received the Holy Spirit from his Father God,
so that he could give the Spirit to us.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리에게 성령을 주실 수 있었다.

sentences.original_text: This is what God had promised to do.
God has poured his Holy Spirit on us.
Now you are seeing and hearing the result of this.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희는 이 결과를 보고 듣고 있다.
